resources.string:
PARX is a fun way to collect badges for visiting Kentucky's State Parks and Historic Sites.

As you visit these locations, you will be making progress and earning badges that reflect something specific about each place you go.

There is an Appal Badge for the Appalachian Region,
 Daniel Boone's Sheltowee Badge.
And others that you'll discover as you go.
 

I hope you have fun exploring Kentucky!
PARX is easy!\n\n All you have to do is to open the app when you are at a State Park or State Historic Site, and your progress will be recorded automatically.
